alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 11:40PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Searcy, central Marion and Baxter Counties through 1215 AM CST... At 1140 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Price Place to Bull Shoals to Rush. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Yellville... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Norfork... Salesville... Briarcliff... Arkawana... Bull Shoals State Park... Herron... Colfax... Maumee... Rodney... Advance... Cartney... Culp... Norfork Dam... Diamond Bay... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Searcy County Lower Elevations
